titleStmt.title: Exercitationes philologicæ tres prima, Infanticidium, poema credulam experimens matrem delirantibus astrologorum insomniis, & piâ quâdam crudelitate deceptam, prolem suam intersecisse : secunda, Spes extatica, sive sperantis animæ plausus, & ovatio : tertia, Philosophia vindicata, sive pauperis philosophi contra divitem superbe calumniantem defensio / authore Jo. Northleigh ...
titleStmt.author: Northleigh, John, 1657-1705.
